properties.name: problem.enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to enable Problem handling.

properties.name: problem.type-url
properties.description: Default: http://localhost:8080/problems/help.html, Help page base url.

properties.name: problem.debug-enabled
properties.description: Default: false, Whether or not to include debug-info such as message codes etc. in error response messages.

properties.name: problem.stacktrace-enabled
properties.description: Default: false, Whether or not to include stacktrace in error response messages.

properties.name: problem.cause-chains-enabled
properties.description: Default: false, Whether or not to include exception cause in error response messages.

properties.name: problem.jackson-module-enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to Enable Jackson Problem module.

properties.name: problem.dao-advice-enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to Enable DAO exception handling advices.

properties.name: problem.security-advice-enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to Enable Security exception handling advices.

properties.name: problem.open-api.path
properties.description: Default: /oas/api.json, Path of API Specification json file.

properties.name: problem.open-api.exclude-patterns
properties.description: Default: None. List of path patterns in ant-pattern format to exclude from OpenAPI Specification validation.

properties.name: problem.open-api.req-validation-enabled
properties.description: Default: true, Whether or not to enable Open API request validation.</br>While enabling make sure Problem is also enabled.

properties.name: problem.open-api.res-validation-enabled
properties.description: Default: false, Whether or not to enable Open API response validation.</br>While enabling make sure Problem is also enabled.
